title: Dearest Dorin
description: No longer sold individually and is now available in Dearest Clementine’s Dark and Romantic Tales’ collectionAfter receiving a collection of dark and romantic monstrous tales from her dearest Dorin, Clementine pens a ghostly story for him in return, which begs the question, can love truly conquer anything?Dearest Dorin is a companion short story to Dearest Clementine: Dark and Romantic Monstrous Tales
author: Candace Robinson
